## Classes

### <a name="profile_ldap_server"></a>`profile_ldap_server`

Configure an LDAP server for use at NCSA

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_ldap_server
```

### <a name="profile_ldap_servercrontab"></a>`profile_ldap_server::crontab`

Configure CRON jobs for LDAP services

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_ldap_server::crontab
```

### <a name="profile_ldap_serverfirewall"></a>`profile_ldap_server::firewall`

Configure firewall rules for LDAP services

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_ldap_server::firewall
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_ldap_server::firewall` class:

* [`allowsubnets`](#allowsubnets)
* [`badsubnets`](#badsubnets)

##### <a name="allowsubnets"></a>`allowsubnets`

Data type: `Hash`

List of subnets that are allowed to connect to LDAP services

##### <a name="badsubnets"></a>`badsubnets`

Data type: `Hash`

List of subnets that are probitited to connect to LDAP services

### <a name="profile_ldap_serverservices"></a>`profile_ldap_server::services`

Configure services for LDAP server

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_ldap_server::services
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_ldap_server::services` class:

* [`packages_absent`](#packages_absent)
* [`packages_present`](#packages_present)
* [`pam_authtype`](#pam_authtype)

##### <a name="packages_absent"></a>`packages_absent`

Data type: `Array[String]`

List of packages to ensure absent

##### <a name="packages_present"></a>`packages_present`

Data type: `Array[String]`

List of packages to ensure present

##### <a name="pam_authtype"></a>`pam_authtype`

Data type: `String`

Authtype to use in pam
